page.title: 17INDUSTRY/EMPLOYMENT
page.content: PRIESTLEY FOOTWEAR WAS FOUNDED BY THE PRESENT CHAIRMAN AND MANAGING DIRECTOR. IT NOW FORMS PART OF PENTLAND INDUSTRIES PLC,THE BARNET BASED INTERNATIONAL TRADING COMPANY IN THE FOOTWEAR,CLOTHING AND LEISURE INDUSTRIES. PRIESTLEY EMPLOYS APPROXIMATELY 450 PEOPLE OF WHOM 45 ARE IN THE BLACKBURN FACTORY AND 60 IN THE PRESTON FACTORY.THEY MANUFACTURE LADIES FASHION SHOES FOR THE MEDIUM PRICE BRACKET, WHICH ARE DISTRIBUTED THROUGH MOST OF THE WELL KNOWN HIGH STREET RETAILERS AND CHAIN STORES. IT IS INTERESTING TO NOTE THAT FOUR YEARS AGO AT THE START OF WHAT IS KNOWN AS THE RECESSION,PRIESTLEY WAS MAKING 14,000 PAIRS PER WEEK WITH 272 STAFF.PRODUCTION IS NOW 28,000 PAIRS PER WEEK.AND PRODUCTIVITY HAS INCREASED BY APPROXIMATELY 25%.
